entry.name: size
entry.title: Size Effect
entry.desc: Resize an element to a specified width and height.

longdesc.p: When using this effect with the .show() and .toggle() methods, the to argument is used as the starting point and the original size used as the endpoint.

argument.name: to
argument.desc: Height and width to resize to.

argument.name: scale
argument.desc: Which areas of the element will be resized: "both", "box", "content". Box resizes the border and padding of the element; content resizes any content inside of the element.

example.desc: Resize the element using the size effect.
example.html: Click anywhere to resize the box.
